features: HEALTHY CERAMIC NONSTICK: Our healthy and easy-to-clean ceramic nonstick coating is derived from sand and free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium for effortless cooking and quick cleanup.
3-PLY STAINLESS STEEL BODIES: Two layers of stainless steel surround a quick-heating aluminum core to deliver incredible results.
REINFORCED WITH DIAMONDS: This collection's diamond-reinforced coating is incredibly durable.
VERSATILE DESIGN: Built for advanced cooking, these pots and pans are oven safe up to 600˚F (lids up to 425˚F).
INDUCTION READY: Designed to perform on all stovetops, including induction.
RIVETED STAINLESS STEEL HANDLES: The contoured, durable handles keep you comfortable and in command.
EASY TO CLEAN: Dishwasher safe, but most messes wipe away.
body.description: This 8” frying pan is a versatile little wonder built for nailing sautéed veggies, fried hash browns, and morning eggs without worry. Featuring two layers of stainless steel surround an aluminum core, this pan heats quickly, evenly, and performs as good as it looks. And it’s finished with our toxin-free ceramic nonstick coating, so everything you make will be a little healthier, too. That’s because our ceramic nonstick is not stuck in the past—our ceramic nonstick starts with sand and creates 60% fewer CO2 emissions during the curing phase than traditional coatings. Designed for effortless performance and cleanup, this frying pan is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium. This tri-ply collection’s coating is also reinforced with diamonds for incredible durability. For all stovetops, including induction. Oven safe up to 600°F. Dishwasher safe.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GreenLife Stainless Pro Healthy Ceramic Tri-Ply Frying Pan

The Stainless Pro Collection TRI-PLY POWER & PERFORMANCE We’re breaking new ground with this 3-ply collection. Featuring two layers of stainless steel surround an aluminum core, this collection heats quickly, evenly, and performs as good as it looks. But that's not all. Designed for effortless performance and cleanup, this collection features our toxin-free Thermolon nonstick coating, which is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium. It’s also reinforced with diamonds for incredible durability. Reinforced with Diamonds HEALTHY CERAMIC NONSTICK GreenLife's healthy ceramic nonstick coating is reinforced with diamonds for extra strength. It's also free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium. What's that mean for you? No toxic fumes, even if it's overheated. The same great performance as traditional nonstick, just without the nasties. Stovetop-to-Oven Cooking STURDY STAINLESS GRIP Artisan's tough stainless steel handles offer an easy and durable grip that takes your cooking wherever you need it. Big Messes Don't Stand a Chance! DISHWASHER SAFE Artisan makes cleanup simple—just rinse, wipe, and you're good to go. When things get really messy, though, it's easy to toss it in the dishwasher.

Previous page Ceramic Nonstick A diamond-reinforced ceramic nonstick derived from sand and free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium. Stainless Handle Designed for comfort and performance, this ergonomic handle lets this set go from stovetop to oven. Tri-Ply Construction Two layers of stainless steel & a quick-heating aluminum core make Stainless Pro endlessly versatile All Stovetops Stainless Pro goes everywhere! It's safe for all stovetops, plus it's oven safe to 600˚F Next page 3-Ply Frying Pan Made to Last 1 Coating 2 Handle 3 Body 4 Stovetops

For you and everyone else Our healthy ceramic nonstick is not stuck in the past! Reduce your carbon cookprint Our coating’s curing phase creates 60% less CO2 than the curing phase for traditional coatings. Toxin-free and extra clean Our ceramic nonstick is a healthy twist on nonstick. Free of PFAS (& all the other nasties).
Get the Most Out of Your Pan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice frying pan
reviews.reviewText: Very Nice frying pan. This is a super nice skillet - stainless steel on the outside and ceramic on the inside. It is just the correct weight (not too heavy) to lift and move around. The coating is very smooth and wonderfully non-stock - food just slides out onto the plate. So easy to clean - just wipe with soap and warm water. The food seems to heat evenly over the entire pan and cool pretty quickly . They ask you to heat the pan for 90 seconds- then get started. The hardest thing for me will be to remember to NOT use a spray on this pan - to use only butter or oil. It also suggests you use a soft utensil and to not get the pan too hot on the stove top. I haven't had this long enough to use in the oven - but I'm looking forward to that versatility. I highly recommend this skillet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Everyday Pan That Exceeding My Expectations
reviews.reviewText: I love to cook! Oftentimes I spend half a day in my kitchen preparing and cooking meals for my family. Pots and pans are important to me, so choosing a good pan is key to creating a good meal, effortlessly. I was impressed with the Green Life line of products and decided to try the 10 inch frying pan. I was so excited when it arrived and immediately took it to its new home, my stove. I would first suggest you read the enclosed booklet before you use your pan. One of the points mentioned in the booklet was that this pan does NOT heat like other pans. It’s recommended to use moderate heat. Of course, I decided to try this out and turned my heat to the normal setting I would typically use to grill my veggies. In just a few minutes, I had to lower the heat. This pan definitely heats quicker and cooks faster. I had no problems using this pan other than my food was taking me less time to cook and was sliding with no problem. When it came time to cleanup, I was prepared to spend a good amount of time cleaning off the residue. Boy was I pleasantly surprised. The use of paper napkin was all it took to clean it up. The pan was a hit to say the least. The pan exceeded my expectations and was not as heavy as I expected it to be, which was a plus. I even liked the depth of this pan being right around two inches. Its overall value is excellent for the quality and I highly recommend this frying pan to others who spend a lot of time in the kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have never owned a non-stick pan, instead using properly-seasoned cast-iron and carbon steel, and multi-layered stainless, etc. However, I really wanted to be able to easily make crepes, and for this I need a really good non-stick pan that was safe to use. I only looked at ceramic pans, since the safety of PTFE seems to be questionable, and it never lasts.Anyway, this pan is very good. It cooks perfectly and crepes slide around in it with no oil whatsoever. In fact, it's a little tricky to even get a spatula under the crepe without the crepe sliding away. When all the crepes are made, the pan requires no cleaning other than a quick wipe with a cloth.It's quite amazing, and well worth the money.Update: My wife ruined it by packing it carelessly for a trip. These have an extremely delicate nonstick surface. You should definitely hang it up too high for your wife to reach it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Durable and heavy
reviews.reviewText: I like the how even it cooks and easily cooks. I like the large glass lid.I do not like how it feels heavy; the long handle may cause that. I small handle opposite side may have helped.I like the light clean colors.It does heat up face....something to be aware of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size and weight
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for 2 eggs. Light weight. Clean up a breeze..PERFECTTTTT

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Super disappointed! WARNING!
reviews.reviewText: I just purchased this set over Thanksgiving. I got rid if packaging as the pans seemed of good quality and I thought its a keeper. Today I used the larger pot, just once and when I rinsed it I saw this. I used only silicone utensils and used a soft cotton dishcloth. Now I am bummed but can’t return as I don’t have the packaging anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Loved it but now no so sure
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this pan and used it for the last 4 months or so. At first I absolutely loved it. It cooked great and evenly, super easy to clean and nothing stuck. Now I’m 4 almost 5 months in and I’m not impressed. Everything sticks to it. I followed the instructions that came with it to a T. I’ve always hand washed, used the proper oil, used the right utensils, and never got about 2.5 as far as heat goes. Maybe I got a crappy pan, and the rest is better quality but I don’t feel I’ll buy anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my favorite pans
reviews.reviewText: I really like this pan a lot. Non stick, easy to clean, cooks evenly and doesn’t scratch up or chip even using a metal turner.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy bonitas y de excelente calidad.
reviews.reviewText: Miy bonita batería, el recubrimiento lo vale, todavía no las uso pero me encantaron. En el fondo trae grabado que son para inducción. Me encantaron!
La qualité semble excellente. On va voir a l usages.
I have been using it almost daily, and i love it, i am very careful when it comes to cleaning and i follow the instructions. so far impressed by it
